definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the main methods of preserving health is summed up.
sentences.chinese: 歸納了中醫學健康狀態調攝的主要方式。

sentences.english: Nursing the body after the disease and excluding the harmful factors are very important.
sentences.chinese: 病後調攝，調體爲先，排除不良因素。

sentences.english: At forty every man is a fool or his own physician.
sentences.chinese: 人到四十，若非蠢材，當知調攝。
